name: lark-emergency-order-dashboard
description: GCP Serverless dashboard for Lark emergency order monitoring

scripts.deploy:update: gcloud functions deploy updateEmergencyOrderCache --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-topic emergency-order-update --entry-point updateEmergencyOrderCache --source ./dist --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:view: gcloud functions deploy viewEmergencyOrderDashboard --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point viewEmergencyOrderDashboard --source ./dist --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npm run deploy:update && npm run deploy:view
scripts.create-scheduler: gcloud scheduler jobs create pubsub emergency-order-scheduler --schedule='0 * * * *' --topic=emergency-order-update --location=asia-northeast1 --message-body='{}'
